00214 namespace Omiscid {
00215 
00216 
00217 // Trace management
00218 #ifdef OMISCID_TRACE_ENABLE
00219     #define OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED 1
00220 #else
00221     #define OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED 0
00222 #endif
00223 
00227 inline void OmiscidError(const char * format, ... )
00228 {
00229     va_list args;
00230     va_start( args, format );
00231     vfprintf( stderr, format, args );
00232     va_end( args );
00233 }
00234 
00235 inline void OmiscidTrace(const char * format, ... )
00236 {
00237     va_list args;
00238     va_start( args, format );
00239 #ifdef DEBUG
00240     vfprintf( stderr, format, args );
00241 #else
00242     vprintf( format, args );
00243 #endif
00244     va_end( args );
00245 }
00246 
00247 #define OmiscidError  !(OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED) ? (void)0 : OmiscidError
00248 #define OmiscidTrace  !(OMISCID_TRACE_IS_ENABLED) ? (void)0 : OmiscidTrace
00249 
00250 // Message for developping purpose
00251 #ifdef DEBUG
00252     #define DevOmiscidTrace OmiscidError
00253 #else
00254     inline void DevOmiscidTrace( const char * format, ... ) {}
00255 #endif
00256 
00257 // Define an OmiscidMessage depend on DEBUG flag but always doing a trace
00258 #ifdef DEBUG
00259     #define OmiscidMessage OmiscidError
00260 #else
00261     #define OmiscidMessage OmiscidTrace
00262 #endif
